query:
-- Listar todas as tabelas e contagem de registros
SELECT 
  'users' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Usuários do sistema (autenticação)' as funcao
FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'projects' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Projetos/workspaces separados' as funcao
FROM projects
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'clientes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Base de clientes (806 originais)' as funcao
FROM clientes
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'mercados_unicos' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Mercados identificados (enriquecimento)' as funcao
FROM mercados_unicos
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'clientes_mercados' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Associação clientes ↔ mercados' as funcao
FROM clientes_mercados
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'produtos' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Produtos dos clientes por mercado' as funcao
FROM produtos
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'concorrentes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Concorrentes por mercado' as funcao
FROM concorrentes
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'leads' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Leads potenciais por mercado' as funcao
FROM leads
WHERE projectId = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'tags' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Tags personalizadas' as funcao
FROM tags
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'entity_tags' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Associação entidades ↔ tags' as funcao
FROM entity_tags
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'saved_filters' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Filtros salvos por usuário' as funcao
FROM saved_filters
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'notifications' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as registros,
  'Notificações e alertas' as funcao
FROM notifications;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute
